title: Bug 114470[Smoke] Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: The bug occurs when using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter. An error message is thrown.
OB: When using new Date("3/2/2005") as a value in a table filter, an error message is thrown.
EB: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") in a table filter, the filter should apply without any error message being thrown.
SR:
To reproduce the bug, follow these steps:

1. Create a datasource and a dataset containing a datetime column.
2. Insert a table and create a filter based on the datetime column.
3. In the filter value, input new Date("3/2/2005"). For example, new Date("3/2/2005").
